Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [telegram] <BrokenBank> Thanks. All setup with the mobile wallet. Now if one-day I get a desktop, can I use the seed from the mobile wallet and add it straight to the desktop, or should I start another account and then send it to that address from the mobile wallet?

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [telegram] <BrokenBank> Sorry for all the questions. Last one

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [telegram] <yorklab> Yes, same seed, same address.

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [telegram] <BrokenBank> Brilliant (re @yorklab: Yes, same seed, same address.)

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [telegram] <yorklab> You could create another account to be safe, but that's up to you.

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [telegram] <BrokenBank> Yep great. Can you generate new addresses with each transaction with KMD?

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [telegram] <yorklab> In Lite mode you need a new seed for each new address. In Native mode (you have to download the blockchain) it creates a new address each time you claim rewards.
